title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.5 - Safeguarding information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.5 - Safeguarding information

State Regulations

Any requests for the release of information in the
custody of the department related to this Part shall be handled according to
the provisions of New York Public Officers Law, section 87, and Part 616 of
this Title, Public access to records of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
